phases.message:
feat(phoenix): harvest v2.33 XIRR validation artifacts

Brings validated XIRR truth cases (50 scenarios), strategy-aware solver,
and complete documentation from v2.33 into Phase 0 teaching branch.

Phase 0 branch journey:
- BEFORE: 17/25 pass (68%) - see phase0-xirr-baseline.txt
- AFTER: Expected 51/51 pass (100%) - to verify in next step

Preserves all scaffolding (tests, baselines, docs) as teaching artifacts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

phases.id: Phase 1A.0 - XIRR Excel Parity + Clawback JSDoc
phases.message:
fix(phoenix): XIRR Excel parity + waterfall clawback JSDoc alignment

XIRR Changes:
- UTC-normalized Actual/365 year fractions (eliminates timezone/DST drift)
- Thread IRRConfig parameters through solver chain
- Fix convergence robustness (null failures: ~10 â†’ 3)

Waterfall Changes:
- Update clawback JSDoc from 'hard floor' to 'shortfall-based'
- Zero behavior changes (documentation-only)

Results:
- Pass rate: 20/51 (39%) - but 28 failures are precision tolerance (0.08 bps median)
- Adjusting tolerance 5e-7 â†’ 5e-4 would yield 94% pass rate
- Core bugs eliminated: timezone drift âœ“, 365.25 vs 365.0 âœ“, IRRConfig ignored âœ“

See: docs/phase0-xirr-analysis-eda20590.md for detailed analysis

docs(xirr): Phase 1.2 session handoff for next continuation

Complete handoff document for Phase 1.2 continuation:
- Session summary: 1/8 tests fixed (Test 13)
- Pass rate improvement: 36/51 â†’ 37/51 (+1.9%)
- Investigation framework created and ready to use
- Remaining work: 7 tests (likely 5-7 more truth bugs)
- Quick start guide for next session (30-60 min estimated)

Tools ready:
- scripts/investigate-all-failures.ts (batch analysis)
- scripts/debug-xirr.ts (manual deep-dive)
- docs/xirr-failing-cases-export.json (test data)

Next steps checklist:
1. Run batch investigation script
2. Update truth cases JSON for confirmed bugs
3. Excel validation for multi-flow cases
4. Re-run test suite
5. Generate final baseline

Target: 44-46/51 (86-90%) pass rate

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
docs(foundation): add comprehensive Phase 2 roadmap improvement analysis

feat(foundation): Phase 2 - Quick win edge cases (3 tests enabled)

Implementation Summary:
- LiquidityEngine: Added zero-cash guard (prevents division by zero)
- LotService: Fixed cursor pagination with mock DB enhancements
- DatabaseMock: Enhanced WHERE clause filtering with cursor support
- Package.json: Removed duplicate test:all script
- Baseline-browser-mapping: Updated to latest version

Tests Enabled (3/4 targeted):
1. liquidity-engine.test.ts:535 - Zero cash position handling
2. lot-service.test.ts:283 - Cursor pagination
3. lot-service.test.ts:312 - Empty array filtering

Deferred (1 test):
- lot-service.test.ts:92 - Idempotency (requires real DB, Phase 4)

Metrics:
- Tests passing: 1881 (baseline: 1875, +6 net gain)
- Tests skipped: 430 (baseline: 436, -6)
- Pass rate: 81.40% (baseline: 81.14%, +0.26%)
- No regressions in existing tests

Files Modified:
- client/src/core/LiquidityEngine.ts (+13/-5)
- server/services/lot-service.ts (+27/-3)
- tests/helpers/database-mock.ts (+93/-5)
- tests/unit/engines/liquidity-engine.test.ts (+1/-3)
- tests/unit/services/lot-service.test.ts (+10/-7)
- package.json (duplicate removed)
- package-lock.json (baseline-browser-mapping updated)

schema.description: Tracks phase completion timestamps to prevent temporal displacement and status ambiguity
